title: tags
content:
Link Example: <a href="url">link text</a>
CSS: <link rel="stylesheet" href="style.css">
or
<style>
body {background-color: maroon;}
h1 {color: blue;}
 </style>
Image: <img src="url" alt="some_text" style="width:width;height:height;">
Paragraph: <p>This is a paragraph.</p>
HTML: <html> <head> ... </head> <body> ... </body> </html>
Java: <script language="JavaScript"> var text = document.getElementById("firstP").innerHTML; window.alert(text); </script>
